page.title: 16Sawston/Babraham Games
page.content: Children's Games {HIDE AND SEEK:_}The trad. game of hiding and being looked for.{STICK IN {MUD:_}Chase game. Child 'had' stands with legs apart and is 'released' when another crawls through. 40/49{IN:_}a form of hide and seek where caught players are freed by others arriving at base unseen.{ELASTICS:_}3 or 4 players stretch large circle of elastic. 1 player does various kinds of jumping in and out.{BULLDOG:_}a game in which you have to cross a marked zone with out being touched. Anyone touched joins the catchers. {POLO/TV GAME:_}A guessing game, clues being given,racing to give the answer.{JACK MAY I CROSS YOUR COLOURED {WATER:_}Children chant 'Jack..'etc. Jack calls a colour. Those wearing it ,run. Jack tries to catch.{STUNTMEN, {WARS,TEDDY BEAR:_}Imaginative acting.
